= Installing TextBE 1.0.0 =
  
  
  # Install a version of the [http://www.java.com/en/download/index.jsp Java Runtime Environment] > 1.6.0 on your platform
  # Install a version of [http://www.graphviz.org/Download.php Graphviz]
  # Select the appropriate Version of TextBe for your platform from the downloads
